text.tspan: Total number of deaths from road traffic incidents, including vehicle drivers or passengers, motorcyclists, cyclists
and pedestrians. SDG Target 3.6 is to halve the global number of deaths from road incidents by 2020 (from 2010

text.textPath: SDG Target 3.6 (halving global road deaths by 2020)
SDG Target 3.6 (halving global road deaths by 2020)

text.tspan: Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease
